long_description: The Garmin Virb Audio-Video Cable serves as a 4-to-1 converter, making it easy to share your Virb's video and audio with crystal-clear quality, and add sound from an external mic (not included). Cable provides your Garmin Virb (sold separately) with 3.5mm stereo input for an external mic, RCA composite video output, 3.5mm stereo audio out and a mini-USB port.
short_description: The Garmin Virb Audio-Video Cable serves as a 4-to-1 converter, making it easy to share your Virb's video and audio with crystal-clear quality, and add sound from an external mic (not included).
